text: Tamra sampradayera madhye yara garba karechila tadera pradhanara balale odera yara durbalata bodha karato -- odera madhye yara imana enechila tadera -- ''tomara ki jano ye salih tara prabhura kacha theke ekajana prerita-purusa?’’ Tara balale -- ''nihsandeha tamke diye ya pathano hayeche tate amara bisbasi.’’
